root.title: diamond shamrock dia cut crude price
root.body: diamond shamrock corp sai effect todai cut contract price crude oil 1.50 dlr barrel reduct bring post price west texa intermedi 16.00 dlr barrel copani sai price reduct todai make light fall oil product price weak crude oil market compani spokeswoman sai diamond latest line u.s. oil compani cut contract post price last two dai cite weak oil market
